Headline: Blue Line Delays, Limited Service Between O'Hare and Rosemont
ShortDescription: Blue Line service experiencing delays due to track switching problems near O'Hare; limited service via train shuttle available btwn O'hare & Rosemont.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Blue Line trains are experiencing delays to due track switching problems near O'Hare.

As a result, trains are operating in two sections:

  • between Forest Park and Rosemont, and,
  • between Rosemont and O'Hare, with limited service.

Change trains at Rosemont for continuing service to/from Forest Park.

Bus shuttles requested also available to help make connections.

See station personnel for further assistance, and pay attention to announcements on trains and at stations for service information.

We are working to restore service as quickly as possible. Allow extra travel time.
